articles.description: The springtime extravaganza returns with another sweeping bill of fare. We trawled through the slate so you can savor the gems.
articles.content: Novak stars as Ben, a Manhattan journalist and serial dater who flies to Nowheresville, Texas, for the funeral of a woman he was seeing. Only a fling, Abilene meant little to him. But in her grieving… [+1446 chars]
